channel.title: DownsX 317 Loading 602+ | Many Bosses | Dungeoneering | JUST OPENED!
channel.description:
I've decided to put this server up after working on it for a little while. It has a lot of potential just needs to get the name out!
[CENTER]Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.downsx.com"]http://www.downsx.com[/URL] Webclient: [URL=http://"http://www.downsx.com/webclient.php"]http://www.downsx.com/webclient.php[/URL] Downloadable: [URL=http://"http://www.downsx.com/Downloads/DownsX.jar"]http://www.downsx.com/Downloads/DownsX.jar[/URL][/CENTER]
Features:
[ul][li]Decanting[/li] [li]Completionist Cape[/li] [li]Clan Chat with Ranking System[/li] [li]All Skills Working[/li] [li]Many Bosses to keep you going[/li] [li]Fully Functional Highscores[/li] [li]Daily Updates[/li] [li]Chaotics[/li] [li]Nex Armours[/li] [li]24/7 VPS Hosted[/li] [li]All Shops in One NPC[/li] [li]Ancient Curses[/li] [li]Mystery Boxes[/li][/ul]
Skills
[ul][li]All Combat Skills (Of Course)[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li] [li]Hunter[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Summoning[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Dungoneering (With 5 Floors + 4 Complexities)[/li][/ul]
Minigames:
[ul][li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Fight Cave[/li] [li]Warriors Guild[/li][/ul]
Server Update Log: [CODE]Supply shop: - Removed super potions, super restores, and saradomin brews - Removed herblore supplies - Removed fury and Rocktails - Organized the shop so it looks better. - Removed amulet of glory
Skilling Shop: - Removed seed box - Removed Dragonstones - Removed Dragon Hatchet - Removed Dragon Pickaxe
Weapon shop ; - Removed the useless stuff such as claws, daggers. - Replaced Dragon Dagger (P++) with Regular Dragon Dagger - Removed Granite Maul and Ancient staff
Magic Shop: - Removed Blood runes and Death runes - Reduced Nature and Astral Rune Amounts
Ranged supplies ; - Remove Black D’Hide - Exchanged Runite Bolts for Adamant
- Added ::curses true/false command until I add altar - Added basic Bonfire, clicking fire removes log and adds a little extra XP. - Added Chaos Tunnels 100% with Bork - Changed Tormented Demons location - Fixed Extreme Donator Crown in Yell - Implanted Owner Rank for ALL commands - Added 2x XP for BETA - Increased normal Combat XP for low Player Count - Fixed Use-Quickly Bank - Fixed Brimhaven and Tavernly Teleports - Added Bank Command to Extremes, Administrators, and Owners - Added 100% Highscores (Found Here) - Added Highscores, Vote, Donate, and Forums commands - Added Decanting for NPC 6524 [Bob Barter] - Fixed the glitch where Extreme Prayer Potions gave 240 HP - Fixed Ancient Effigy EXP given is as follows: Starved: 150,000 Nourished: 200,000 Stated: 250,000 Gorged: 300,000 - Fixed Accept and Decline Trade Dupe Fix - Fixed Slayer Skillcape GFX - Added Ivandis Flail’s proper animations - Added Magic Weapon/Amulet Support to increase Magic Max Hit properly (before it just had ancient staff and masters wand giving bonuses) - Added Money Vault - Added a Teleport Class to Organize and make creating Teleports Easy - Added Bandit Camp to Desert Training Teleport - Added Mystery Box with Random Rewards - Made GMaul Spec 100% on NPC’s and Players - Added more drops to Nechs and Gargs - Perfected Crumble the Undead - Moved the Home to Mos’lee Harmless Island[/CODE]
Client Update Log: [CODE]Fixed Login Screen Hover Areas Fixed Clicking Added Remember Me Added method to make Sprites Move Fixed Bright Green Tree’s Added Background when Loading Bar is Loading Added Random Messages on Loading Bar (Made it print them in random orders) Added Screenshot Feature Added Dungeoneering Invite to Party Interface (Released by me here) Added Goblin Salute Image to Emote Tab Added Password Strength Fixed HP/Prayer Orb Colors, It’s now Green, Yellow, Orange, Red instead of the random white. Added Formatting to Examine Info, (Ex. 2147000000 now is 2,147,000,000) Added Bonfire Support Ctrl to Reply Fixed Small Net Model Improved Magic Log Model (It’s not half white now) Fixed Flickering on Loading Bar Added Owner Rank Added Ability to Launch URLs on any OS Added New Water Texture which removed Black Lines Added Water Texture to Catherby, now it’s not Plain Blue Fixed PM System, Used to drop random messages. Removed Actions from Bob Barter, Made 2 Actions (Decant Potions , Quick Decant) Fixed Black Square Boxes in Lava, Made all One Color of Yellow Fixed Clan Chat Crowns :D Added Complete 525, Fixed 95% of White Walls[/CODE]
Media: [More to Come] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566145/Decanting1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566146/Decanting2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566147/DungComplex.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566148/DungFloors.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566149/Monsters.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3566151/Shops.png[/img]
Credits: 50% to me for all the updates and work I put in Client/Server Wise 50% to Logic for his Zakynthos Base

item.title: DownsX 317 Loading 602+ | Many Bosses | Dungeoneering | JUST OPENED!
item.dc:creator: @wizofdeath8 wizofdeath8
item.description:
@wizofdeath8 wrote:

I’ve decided to put this server up after working on it for a little while. It has a lot of potential just needs to get the name out!

[CENTER]Forums: http://www.downsx.com
Webclient: http://www.downsx.com/webclient.php
Downloadable: http://www.downsx.com/Downloads/DownsX.jar[/CENTER]

Features:

[ul][li]Decanting[/li]
[li]Completionist Cape[/li]
[li]Clan Chat with Ranking System[/li]
[li]All Skills Working[/li]
[li]Many Bosses to keep you going[/li]
[li]Fully Functional Highscores[/li]
[li]Daily Updates[/li]
[li]Chaotics[/li]
[li]Nex Armours[/li]
[li]24/7 VPS Hosted[/li]
[li]All Shops in One NPC[/li]
[li]Ancient Curses[/li]
[li]Mystery Boxes[/li][/ul]

Skills

[ul][li]All Combat Skills (Of Course)[/li]
[li]Runecrafting[/li]
[li]Hunter[/li]
[li]Agility[/li]
[li]Herblore[/li]
[li]Thieving[/li]
[li]Crafting[/li]
[li]Fletching[/li]
[li]Slayer[/li]
[li]Summoning[/li]
[li]Mining[/li]
[li]Smithing[/li]
[li]Fishing[/li]
[li]Cooking[/li]
[li]Firemaking[/li]
[li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Farming[/li]
[li]Dungoneering (With 5 Floors + 4 Complexities)[/li][/ul]

Minigames:

[ul][li]Pest Control[/li]
[li]Barrows[/li]
[li]Duel Arena[/li]
[li]Fight Pits[/li]
[li]Fight Cave[/li]
[li]Warriors Guild[/li][/ul]

Server Update Log:

[CODE]Supply shop:

  • Removed super potions, super restores, and saradomin brews
  • Removed herblore supplies
  • Removed fury and Rocktails
  • Organized the shop so it looks better.
  • Removed amulet of glory

Skilling Shop:

  • Removed seed box
  • Removed Dragonstones
  • Removed Dragon Hatchet
  • Removed Dragon Pickaxe

Weapon shop ;

  • Removed the useless stuff such as claws, daggers.
  • Replaced Dragon Dagger (P++) with Regular Dragon Dagger
  • Removed Granite Maul and Ancient staff

Magic Shop:

  • Removed Blood runes and Death runes
  • Reduced Nature and Astral Rune Amounts

Ranged supplies ;

  • Remove Black D’Hide

  • Exchanged Runite Bolts for Adamant

  • Added ::curses true/false command until I add altar

  • Added basic Bonfire, clicking fire removes log and adds a little extra XP.

  • Added Chaos Tunnels 100% with Bork

  • Changed Tormented Demons location

  • Fixed Extreme Donator Crown in Yell

  • Implanted Owner Rank for ALL commands

  • Added 2x XP for BETA

  • Increased normal Combat XP for low Player Count

  • Fixed Use-Quickly Bank

  • Fixed Brimhaven and Tavernly Teleports

  • Added Bank Command to Extremes, Administrators, and Owners

  • Added 100% Highscores (Found Here)

  • Added Highscores, Vote, Donate, and Forums commands

  • Added Decanting for NPC 6524 [Bob Barter]

  • Fixed the glitch where Extreme Prayer Potions gave 240 HP

  • Fixed Ancient Effigy EXP given is as follows:
    Starved: 150,000
    Nourished: 200,000
    Stated: 250,000
    Gorged: 300,000

  • Fixed Accept and Decline Trade Dupe Fix

  • Fixed Slayer Skillcape GFX

  • Added Ivandis Flail’s proper animations

  • Added Magic Weapon/Amulet Support to increase Magic Max Hit properly
    (before it just had ancient staff and masters wand giving bonuses)

  • Added Money Vault

  • Added a Teleport Class to Organize and make creating Teleports Easy

  • Added Bandit Camp to Desert Training Teleport

  • Added Mystery Box with Random Rewards

  • Made GMaul Spec 100% on NPC’s and Players

  • Added more drops to Nechs and Gargs

  • Perfected Crumble the Undead

  • Moved the Home to Mos’lee Harmless Island[/CODE]

Client Update Log:

Fixed Login Screen Hover Areas Fixed Clicking Added Remember Me Added method to make Sprites Move Fixed Bright Green Tree’s Added Background when Loading Bar is Loading Added Random Messages on Loading Bar (Made it print them in random orders) Added Screenshot Feature Added Dungeoneering Invite to Party Interface (Released by me here) Added Goblin Salute Image to Emote Tab Added Password Strength Fixed HP/Prayer Orb Colors, It’s now Green, Yellow, Orange, Red instead of the random white. Added Formatting to Examine Info, (Ex. 2147000000 now is 2,147,000,000) Added Bonfire Support Ctrl to Reply Fixed Small Net Model Improved Magic Log Model (It’s not half white now) Fixed Flickering on Loading Bar Added Owner Rank Added Ability to Launch URLs on any OS Added New Water Texture which removed Black Lines Added Water Texture to Catherby, now it’s not Plain Blue Fixed PM System, Used to drop random messages. Removed Actions from Bob Barter, Made 2 Actions (Decant Potions , Quick Decant) Fixed Black Square Boxes in Lava, Made all One Color of Yellow Fixed Clan Chat Crowns :D Added Complete 525, Fixed 95% of White Walls

Media: [More to Come]





Credits:
50% to me for all the updates and work I put in Client/Server Wise
50% to Logic for his Zakynthos Base
